DOC.brief_summary: This study Investigate whether preoperative compute tomography ( CT ) angiography lower operative time post operative complication breast reconstruction perform deep inferior epigastric artery perforator flap ( DIEP ) .
DOC.brief_title: CT-Angiography Prior DIEP Flap Breast Reconstruction Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Planning breast reconstruction DIEP flap Age 18 75 year Mild moderate loss kidney function ( Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate ( eGFR ) < 60 ) Decisionally challenge Pregnant Hepatic failure
DOC.keyword: Deep inferior epigastric artery perforator flap
